name: Isabella (NotCyan)
description:
A short horror experience developed by:

_notcyan (Corey) -

  •  https://notcyan.itch.io/
  • https://twitter.com/notcyanokay_

enigmawasp (Kira)

  • https://itch.io/profile/enigmawasp

Isabella, patient-137, began experiencing 'external delusions', refabricating her surroundings and bringing her darkest fears to life. Doctors haven't been able to contact her in months, it's up to you to find out where and what has happened to her.
